metadata.title: Zeta English Academy Blog | Classroom Stories & English Tips
metadata.description: Read classroom stories, parent guidance, and English learning strategies from Zeta English Academy coaches plus highlights from our LAB, Grammar, Discussion, and Writing programs.

hero.title: Blog & Insights
hero.description: Stay up to date with stories from our classrooms, reflections from Zeta coaches, and practical tips to help your child thrive in English.

highlights.title: Inside the Classroom
highlights.description: Peek into LAB sessions, debate prep, and the daily routines that build confident speakers.

highlights.title: Guidance for Families
highlights.description: Practical advice on supporting English learning at home and celebrating progress together.

highlights.title: Writing & Speaking Tips
highlights.description: Coach-approved strategies that help students organise ideas, edit drafts, and speak with clarity.

feed.title: Recent Articles & Updates
feed.description: Explore the newest posts pulled straight from our Naver blog. Tap any card to read the full story in a new tab.
feed.empty: No blog posts available right now. Please check back soon.
